Test Case Name: Verify space between subjectivity and static wording
Description: Verify that proper space is displayed between entered subjectivity and static wording
Step Description: 1. Navigate to Financial Lines form 2. Enter subjectivity text 3. Observe display with static wording
Expected Result: Space should be visible between subjectivity text and static wording

Test Case Name: Verify spacing in single word subjectivity
Description: Verify that proper spacing is maintained when subjectivity is a single word
Step Description: 1. Enter single word subjectivity 2. Check spacing with static text
Expected Result: Single word subjectivity should have space before static wording

Test Case Name: Verify spacing in multi-word subjectivity
Description: Verify that proper spacing is maintained when subjectivity contains multiple words
Step Description: 1. Enter multi-word subjectivity 2. Check spacing with static text
Expected Result: Multi-word subjectivity should have space before static wording

Test Case Name: Verify spacing in saved Financial Lines record
Description: Verify that spacing persists correctly after saving the Financial Lines record
Step Description: 1. Enter subjectivity 2. Save form 3. Reload record 4. Check spacing
Expected Result: Spacing should be maintained after save and reload

Test Case Name: Verify spacing in exported Financial Lines document
Description: Verify that spacing is correct when Financial Lines document is exported
Step Description: 1. Create Financial Lines with subjectivity 2. Export to PDF 3. Check spacing in output
Expected Result: Exported document should display proper spacing between subjectivity and static text

Test Case Name: Verify spacing with special characters in subjectivity
Description: Verify that spacing works correctly when subjectivity contains special characters
Step Description: 1. Enter subjectivity with special characters (!@#$) 2. Check spacing
Expected Result: Special characters should not affect spacing between subjectivity and static text

Test Case Name: Verify spacing with numbers in subjectivity
Description: Verify that spacing works correctly when subjectivity contains numbers
Step Description: 1. Enter subjectivity with numbers (e.g. Coverage 2025) 2. Check spacing
Expected Result: Numbers in subjectivity should not affect spacing

Test Case Name: Verify spacing consistency across multiple records
Description: Verify that spacing is consistent across multiple Financial Lines records
Step Description: 1. Create multiple Financial Lines records 2. Check spacing on each record
Expected Result: All records should display consistent spacing

Test Case Name: Verify no missing space between subjectivity and static text
Description: Verify that the bug of missing space is fixed (not present)
Step Description: 1. Check current Financial Lines form 2. Verify space exists between subjectivity and static text
Expected Result: Space should be present (bug should be fixed)

Test Case Name: Verify spacing with very long subjectivity
Description: Verify that spacing is maintained even with very long subjectivity text
Step Description: 1. Enter very long subjectivity (200+ characters) 2. Check spacing
Expected Result: Spacing should be maintained regardless of subjectivity length

Test Case Name: Verify no extra spaces inserted
Description: Verify that no unnecessary extra spaces are inserted between subjectivity and static text
Step Description: 1. Check spacing between subjectivity and static text 2. Count spaces
Expected Result: Only single space should exist between subjectivity and static text

Test Case Name: Verify spacing with leading/trailing spaces in subjectivity
Description: Verify that leading/trailing spaces in subjectivity do not cause spacing issues
Step Description: 1. Enter subjectivity with leading/trailing spaces 2. Check final spacing
Expected Result: System should trim spaces and maintain proper single space

Test Case Name: Validate spacing with empty subjectivity
Description: Verify system behavior when subjectivity field is empty
Step Description: 1. Leave subjectivity empty 2. Check static text display
Expected Result: Static text should display correctly or show validation message

Test Case Name: Validate spacing with only whitespace in subjectivity
Description: Verify behavior when subjectivity contains only spaces
Step Description: 1. Enter only spaces in subjectivity field 2. Attempt to save
Expected Result: System should reject whitespace-only entry or trim and show validation error

Test Case Name: Validate subjectivity character length
Description: Verify that subjectivity field has appropriate character limit
Step Description: 1. Enter text longer than limit 2. Check if rejected or truncated
Expected Result: System should either accept valid length or show error

Test Case Name: Validate spacing with Unicode characters in subjectivity
Description: Verify spacing works correctly with Unicode characters (international text)
Step Description: 1. Enter subjectivity with Unicode characters (Chinese Arabic etc.) 2. Check spacing
Expected Result: Spacing should work correctly with Unicode characters

Test Case Name: Validate spacing with HTML special characters
Description: Verify that HTML special characters in subjectivity are properly escaped
Step Description: 1. Enter subjectivity with HTML characters (<>&) 2. Check display
Expected Result: HTML characters should be escaped and spacing maintained

Test Case Name: Validate spacing after subjectivity edit
Description: Verify that spacing is correct after editing existing subjectivity
Step Description: 1. Edit existing subjectivity 2. Check spacing after modification
Expected Result: Spacing should remain correct after edit

Test Case Name: Validate spacing with line breaks in subjectivity
Description: Verify behavior when subjectivity contains line breaks or newline characters
Step Description: 1. Paste subjectivity with line breaks 2. Check spacing
Expected Result: System should handle line breaks appropriately and maintain spacing

Test Case Name: Validate spacing with SQL injection attempt in subjectivity
Description: Verify that SQL injection attempts in subjectivity do not affect spacing
Step Description: 1. Enter SQL injection payload in subjectivity 2. Check if sanitized and spacing maintained
Expected Result: Payload should be sanitized and spacing preserved

Test Case Name: Validate static wording text consistency
Description: Verify that static wording text remains consistent across all records
Step Description: 1. Check static text on multiple Financial Lines records
Expected Result: Static text should be identical across all records

Test Case Name: Validate spacing in different browsers
Description: Verify that spacing displays correctly in different browsers (Chrome Firefox Safari Edge)
Step Description: 1. View Financial Lines in different browsers 2. Check spacing
Expected Result: Spacing should be consistent across all browsers

Test Case Name: Validate spacing on different screen resolutions
Description: Verify that spacing is maintained on different screen resolutions
Step Description: 1. View Financial Lines on different resolutions 2. Check spacing
Expected Result: Spacing should remain consistent regardless of screen resolution

Test Case Name: Validate spacing in PDF export format
Description: Verify that spacing is preserved when exporting to PDF
Step Description: 1. Export Financial Lines to PDF 2. Check spacing in PDF
Expected Result: Spacing should be identical to screen display in PDF

Test Case Name: Validate spacing in printing format
Description: Verify that spacing is correct when printing Financial Lines
Step Description: 1. Print Financial Lines record 2. Check spacing in printed output
Expected Result: Spacing should be maintained in printed format
